item.title: ATC Transponders and Automatic Altitude Reporting Systems – ADS-B Extended Squitter Transmissions

numlitem.para: Operations do not require its use, and
Repairs are made prior to completion of next heavy maintenance visit.
Flight Control to ensure ADS-B Squitter is not required by Foreign States along planned route.

placard.para: Placard affected Parameter "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
